song_name: The Comfort of a Laugh Track
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Comfort of a Laugh Track is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
